thread.title_full: Best bacon description - Review of Hotel Dei Borgognoni, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Spike B
title: Best bacon description
text:
Lovely little hotel roughly halfway (5 or 6 minutes walk) between the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps in a side street off the main road. Great location.
Room was nice and clean with everything you'd expect apart from kettle, tea and coffee. Bed slightly on the firm side, just how I like it. Shower cubicle is a bit small, certainly not room for an inflatable crocodile.
Good breakfast selection, including some very nicely cooked bacon. Ok so it was that streaky stuff that Americans insist on over cooking but, for once it was still soft and juicy much to the amusement of an American guest who had to take a photo of the "raw" meat!
All of the staff were fantastic, well turned out, professional and extremely amiable.
